info: Assassins are highly mobile champions specializing in single-target burst damage.
Fighters are a diverse group of short-ranged combatants who excel at both dealing and surviving damage.

Mages are champions who typically possess great reach, ability-based area of effect damage and crowd control, and who use all of these strengths in tandem with each other to trap and destroy enemies from a distance.
Marksmen are ranged champions whose power almost exclusively revolves around their basic attacks.
Supports are the most selfless champions in the game, forgoing personal power to assist their allies with potent utility and keep enemies at bay with crowd control.
Tanks are tough melee champions who sacrifice damage in exchange for powerful crowd control.
